name: Panasonic Ear and Nose Hair Trimmer for Men with Vacuum Cleaning System, Powerful Motor and Dual-Edge Blades for Smoother Cutting, Wet/Dry – ER-GN70-K (Black)
short_description: Smoother Trimming: The most powerful Panasonic nose trimmer yet, the ER-GN70-K uses a high-velocity motor to drives blades effortlessly and smoothly through thick, coarse hair with no pulling or tugging
Wet, Dry, and Multi-Use: Sleek, slim design can be used to trim nose or ear hair, trim brows or trim away stray facial hair. Use the Panasonic nose and ear trimmer for men wet or dry
Safe, Efficient Cutting: Innovative dual-edge trimmer blades cut hair at the top and sides for efficient trimming of both longer and shorter hairs; safety cone design keeps skin protected from blades

Advanced Micro-Vacuum System: Powerful vacuum collects cut hair for less mess while trimming; run under water to flush out clippings with advanced vortex cleaning system; nose trimmer body rinses clean
Ergonomic Design: Angled profile makes it easier to each inside the nose and comfortable to hold; Cordless, battery-operated design provides up to 40 minutes of use (batteries not included)
product_description: With the high-performance Panasonic ER-GN70-K Ear and Nose Hair Trimmer with Vacuum Cleaning System you can neatly trim nose and ear hair, eyebrows and facial hair without any of the tugs, pulls or pain of traditional nose hair clippers. A quiet, 9400 CPM (cuts-per-minute) motor generates optimum power to cut and trim even thick, coarse hair. This nose hair trimmer for women also features a dual-edge hypo-allergenic inner and outer blades to cut quickly and cleanly. A contoured outer safety cone prevents direct blade contact with skin; dual-edge blades cut hair from the top and sides for quick, clean cutting. A high-efficiency nose hair clipper vacuum system instantly captures and collects hair for easier clean-up. The personal groomer also includes Vortex cleaning system allowing you to clean both trimmer and blades by holding the tip of the trimmer under warm running water and powering on. With its slender rechargeable nose hair trimmer design, the Panasonic ER-GN70-K is ideal for everyday use at home and away. It fits neatly on any sink top or shelf, as well as in gym bags and luggage. The ER-GN70 provides up to 40 minutes of power with two AAA-size Alkaline batteries (not included).

short_description: Trim Stray Facial Hair in Just a Few Strokes: Quick to use and gentle on sensitive skin, this unisex face shaver for women and men lets you trim light facial hair (brows, chin, neck, and sideburns) using just a few swipes of its flexible head

Round-Edge Blades Help Protect Sensitive Skin: Dual blades on this trimmer for women and men are designed especially for minimal skin stimulation, which is especially great for use on aging and acne-prone skin
Flexible Swing Head Contours Your Neck and Face: Compact face trimmer head bends gently, gliding across the face for smooth results
Eyebrow Trimmer for Women and Men: Comb attachments help you trim eyebrow hair and keep you looking great; included eyebrow cover protects eyelashes while brow shaping

Waterproof and Washable: The GM40-K electric trimmer for men and women can be used in or out of the shower; AA battery-operation provides up to 180 minutes of cordless shaving; compact size easily stores in purse or travel kit

Panasonic personal care unites Japanese craftsmanship and technology—this facial hair trimmer for men and women features precision blades inspired by ancient sword making techniques and advanced designs for a superior grooming experience
product_description: The Panasonic GM40-K Detail Trimmer with Flexible Head makes trimming gentle and easy for everyone, specializing in sensitive, delicate areas and acne-prone-skin in areas such as the neck, chin, upper lip, and sideburns. This blades of this facial trimmer feature narrow gaps and rounded edges, minimizing skin stimulation and reducing irritation. A compact, flexible swing head ensures safe, gentle, precise trimming to a length of 0.12 mm (1/212 in), deftly working around skin blemishes and gently trimming in-between eyebrows. The GM40-K face shaver comes with both an eyebrow comb to groom brow hair to between 0.12mm and 7mm, as well as an eyebrow cover that protects lashes while trimming brows. This waterproof, washable trimmer and eyebrow shaver can be used in or out of the shower, dry or with shaving foam; powered by AA batteries, it provides up to 180 minutes of cordless shaving. Its compact size ensures that it stashes away easily at home, and travels easily in a purse, makeup bag or shaving kit.
